author: FARA-Assistant
install_msg: AllianceLogs v0.3.0 installed. Load with [p]load alliance_logs
name: AllianceLogs
short: Publish MissionChief alliance logs from AllianceScraper to Discord
description: Consumes logs from AllianceScraper and posts embeds to configured channels. Per-action colors/icons, style, and multi-channel mirroring.
end_user_data_statement: Stores only posting state (last seen id) and UI config. No external transmissions.
